title: In Client - Runepage bug

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Sometimes when I'm trying to look at my own rune pages, it bugs out and it wont show the popup for the rune page.
Pls help{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
I just encountered this as well.

ARAM lobby, attempted to create a new rune page in champ select.. Boom. Unable to view any runes.
try changing the resolution of the client, fixed it for me
